mapper.select: SELECT class.class_name,course.course_name,stu.stu_id,stu.stu_name,score.course_score from t_class class ,t_score score,t_student stu,t_course course where class.class_id = stu.stu_classid and course.course_id = score.course_id and score.stu_id = stu.stu_id and stu.stu_id = #{stuId}

select count(*) from t_score t1,t_course t2
and t1.stu_id = #{stuId}
and t2.course_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{coursename}),'%')
and t1.course_id = t2.course_id
